summary: Gives Astrid a more badass look that fits better with the image of the leader of the Dark Brotherhood.
descriptionHtml:
Hi 

this is the first mod i made.
It just changes the face of Astrid a little bit.
It gives her a face that fits better with the image of the leader of the Dark Brotherhood instead of the boring vanilla look.


Installation:

-download with nmm

if this would not work:

-download manual
-unpack files 
-move esp and bsa to the skyrim data folder
-activate astrid.esp as plugin with nmm
author: ZockingLeo
